name: Woof Woof (WoofWoof2)
description:
You play as a dog...

A mixed breed the colour of freshly turned dirt and sticky wet mud.

Your coat was once the gold of cornsilk. Your body? Fat and full but now bones peaked from your flesh; serpants under skin.

You loved your owner but maybe it would be better to just leave or maybe...You could stay.

WOOF WOOF is an interactive text-based adventure story game. It features beautiful, hand drawn graphics and a well curated soundtrack. Expect five different endings, story-changing choices and plenty of drama.

WOOF WOOF is for young adults due to coarse language and mature themes.

For the best experience, you are advised to use headphones and play in full screen mode.
